Trigger A creature you can see attempts a ranged Strike against you.

You fling yourself out of harm's way. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap}. Your movement gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. Regardless of whether or not the triggering attack hits, you land @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone} after completing your Leap.
